description: Play the sound alias as if coming from the entity, as a master sound.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: team
description: The team that will be able to hear the sound. Must be either "axis" or "allies".

params.name: ignoreplayer
description: If present, this player will not hear the sound.
